tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: * | eval n = 335 | stats distinctcount('Log Source'), trend(distinctcount('Log Source'))

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | timestats count as 'Total Issues' by x
'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor:%' | stats distinctcount('Log Source'), trend(count('Log Source'))

savedSearches.description: PSFT Ebusiness Suite Functional Issues across areas

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | stats count as 'Total Issues' by Description, 'Prod Area'

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | stats count as 'Total Issues' by x | sort -'Total Issues'

'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area' as Product, 'Issue Severity' as Severity, Scheduling as 'Check Schedule' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | where 'Check Schedule' != null | stats distinctcount(sensor) as 'Total Issues' by 'Check Schedule', Severity, Product

'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area' as Product, 'Issue Severity' as Severity using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval sev = concat('Severity: ', Severity) | stats distinctcount(sensor) as 'Total Issues' by sev

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | stats count as 'Total Issues' by x

savedSearches.description: PSFT Problem labels identified in Concurrent Request Logs, Transaction Logs, Processing Logs

uiConfig.queryString: 'Problem Priority' != null and 'Log Source' in ('EBS Concurrent Request Logs', 'EBS Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Internal Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Transaction Manager Logs') | eval pos = indexOf(Entity, '/') | eval entity = if(pos != -1, substr(Entity, 0, pos), Entity) | stats count by Label, entity

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput:
card=<field:Affected Product Areas>
card=<field:Affected Business Flows>
card=<field:Unique Sensors Triggered>
card=<field:Total Sensor Triggers>
tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'PSFT Sensor*' | link 'Log Source' | rename Count as 'Number of triggers' | stats latest(sensor) as Sensor | lookup table = 'PeopleSoft Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using Sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval 'Issue Support Link' = url('https://support.oracle.com/knowledge/PeopleSoft%20Enterprise/' || replace(N1, '.', _) || '.html', 'Issue Summary') | eval 'File SR' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/SrCreate', SR) | highlightgroups color = #FF5733 [ * | where 'Issue Severity' = '4' ] as 'High Priority' | eventstats sum('Number of triggers') as 'Total Sensor Triggers', distinctcount('Prod Area') as 'Affected Product Areas', distinctcount('Business Flow') as 'Affected Business Flows', distinctcount('Log Source') as 'Unique Sensors Triggered' | fields -N1, -'Issue Severity', -Sensor, -'Issue Summary', 'Log Source' as Sensor
